name: MonetaryComponent.code
title: MonetaryComponent.code
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Codes may be used to differentiate between kinds of taxes, surcharges, discounts etc.
element.definition: A codable breakdown of the type of monetary component. e.g. State Tax, Federal Tax, VIP-Discount.
element.requirements: Some monetary component types can be further classified and need to be differentiated.

extension.valueMarkdown: Codes may be used to differentiate between kinds of taxes, surcharges, discounts etc.
